\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{database.autocleanup.recyclebin}
\label{configuration:DatabaseAutocleanupRecyclebin}
\ClearAPI
Whether the recyclebin contents should be removed during startup in databases which support them (e.g. Oracle 10g/11g). The recycle bin is conrains dropped objects or tables, from where they can be restored (undropped) or finally deleted. Valid values are "true" and "false".

\type{de.osthus.ambeth.persistence.jdbc.config.PersistenceJdbcConfigurationConstants.DatabaseAutoCleanupRecycleBin}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{database.autocleanup.recyclebin}}]

\end{lstlisting}
